queries.remitos_query: SELECT SDHNUM_0, BPCORD_0, BPDNAM_0, CPY_0, STOFCY_0, DLVDAT_0, XX6FLSIGN_0, COUNT(*) OVER() as total_count FROM SDELIVERY WHERE DLVDAT_0 > @dlvdat AND CFMFLG_0 = 2 AND CPY_0 = @cpy AND STOFCY_0 = @stofcy {additionalFilters} ORDER BY DLVDAT_0 DESC OFFSET @offset ROWS FETCH NEXT @pageSize ROWS ONLY

metadata.description: Default SQL queries distributed with updates
